rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thumbnail
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the thumbnail of an image.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: uuid
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state the universally unique identifier of an object.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pageCount
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This propoerty allows to state the number of pages of a Manifest.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: y
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state a coordinate value on a the y-axis.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: x
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state a coordinate value on a the x-axis.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DHCanvas ontology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This vocabulary gathers terms which describes the few elements of the DHCanvas annotation interface data model that are not covered by the IIIF Presentation API nor the Web Annotation Data Model. This is work-in-progress.
